This set is part of the Zenkai Series EX Set 09 and features some of the most iconic characters from the Dragon Ball universe, including Broly, Gogeta, and Cell. Each box contains 24 booster packs, with 12 cards per pack. Collectors and players alike will appreciate the 164 unique cards, including 60 Commons, 30 Uncommons, 29 Rares, 18 Super Rares, 14 Special Rares, 3 Secret Rares, 9 Special Leader Rares, and the elusive 1 God Rare. Perfect for expanding your deck or starting your adventure into the Dragon Ball card game universe​.

title: Shimmering Skies Booster Box Disney Lorcana TCG 2024
body_html: The Disney Lorcana: Shimmering Skies Booster Box is part of the highly-anticipated trading card set released on August 23, 2024. Each booster box contains 24 packs, with 12 cards per pack, offering players and collectors a chance to expand their decks with exclusive cards. This set celebrates a festival in the Lorcana realm, following the defeat of Ursula from the previous set, and introduces fan-favorite characters like Wreck-It Ralph, Elsa, and Anna. Every pack includes a combination of common, uncommon, rare, super rare, or legendary cards, with a guaranteed foil card in each pack. The Shimmering Skies set brings new strategies, characters, and exciting artwork to the Lorcana Trading Card Game.

title: Disney Lorcana D23 Collection Sealed Box 2024
body_html: The Disney Lorcana D23 Collection is an exclusive, limited-edition set released at the 2024 D23 Expo. This collector’s item includes six fan-favorite promo cards, featuring beloved Disney characters like Mickey Mouse and others. Each card is adorned with expanded artwork, making this set a must-have for Disney and trading card enthusiasts alike. The collection comes factory-sealed, ensuring pristine condition for collectors. Available only at select Disney retail locations and the D23 Expo, this set is highly sought-after due to its rarity and the magic it brings to any Lorcana TCG collection.

title: Magic: The Gathering - Duskmourn: House of Horror Bundle
body_html: The Duskmourn: House of Horror Bundle immerses you in the eerie halls of Duskmourn, where nightmares come alive. This bundle includes 9 Play Boosters, each containing 14 Magic cards with a chance for multiple Rares and at least 1 Traditional Foil card. You’ll also receive a Traditional Foil promo card featuring exclusive alternate art, plus 30 Land cards (15 foil and 15 nonfoil), with some showcasing stunning Full Art designs. Additionally, the bundle comes with a Spindown life counter, a storage box, and 2 reference cards—perfect for players who want both exciting gameplay and exclusive collectibles.

title: Magic: The Gathering - Duskmourn: House of Horror Play Booster Box (36 Boosters)
body_html: Enter the haunted halls of Duskmourn: House of Horror with this Play Booster Box, designed for thrilling gameplay in Magic: The Gathering. This set includes 36 Play Boosters, each containing 14 Magic cards that feature 1-4 Rare or Mythic Rare cards, 3-5 Uncommon cards, and 6-9 Common cards. Each booster also includes a Traditional Foil card, with a chance to uncover exclusive Art cards and Textured Foil cards. Perfect for both Limited play and Booster Drafts, this box offers countless hours of strategic fun.

title: Duskmourn: House of Horror Commander-Decks Set of 4
body_html: The Duskmourn: House of Horror Commander-Decks Set of 4 brings you the ultimate multiplayer horror experience in Magic: The Gathering. The set includes four distinct decks: Miracle Worker, Death Toll, Jump Scare!, and Endless Punishment, each equipped with 100 cards. Every deck introduces new Commander mechanics, including 10 unique Archenemy Scheme cards designed for intense multiplayer matches. Each deck features 2 Traditional Foil Borderless Legendary cards and a Collector Booster Sample Pack, adding a special touch to this spooky collection.

title: One Piece TCG Double Pack Set Vol. 4 | 500 Years in the Future OP07
body_html:
The One Piece Double Pack Set Vol. 4 is an exciting addition to the One Piece Card Game series. This set contains 2 booster packs from the 500 Years in the Future expansion (OP-07) and includes 1 exclusive DON!! card with a unique design, perfect for fans looking to expand their collection. The packaging also doubles as a reusable card case, making it both economical and collectible. This set offers players and collectors a chance to immerse themselves further into the world of One Piece.

Contents:

  • 2x OP-07 Booster Packs
  • 1x DON!! Card (2 variations available)
  • Reusable packaging as a card case

title: Dragon Ball Super Card Game Fusion World FB-03 Booster Box  Raging Roar Edition
body_html:
The Dragon Ball Super Fusion World FB-03 Booster Box is packed with excitement for fans and collectors alike. Each sealed box contains 24 booster packs, with 12 random cards per pack, including a promotional code for the digital version of the game. This set introduces the powerful "black deck" with new mechanics, expanding the strategic depth of the game. It also includes 143 total cards, with rare alternate art versions, leader cards, and special reprints of highly sought-after generic cards. Enhance your collection and take your deck to the next level with this incredible release!

Set Configuration:

  • 5x Leaders
  • 52x Commons
  • 39x Uncommons
  • 30x Rares
  • 12x Super Rares
  • 2x Secret Rares
  • 22x Parallel Cards (with alternate art)
  • 3x Special Reprints​

title: Dragon Ball Super Card Game 7th Anniversary Box 2024 BE24 | Premium Edition
body_html: Celebrate seven years of Dragon Ball Super Card Game with the Premium 7th Anniversary Box 2024 (BE24). This exclusive collector's set includes a stunning new Premium Leader Card, 7 iconic Leader Cards, and special holographic and gold-embossed card sets. Featuring fan-favorite designs, a full deck to build, new and reprinted cards, exclusive card sleeves, and a custom gold-stamped storage box, this set is a must-have for any collector or player looking to upgrade their deck with the ultimate Dragon Ball experience.

title: Two Legends Booster Pack One Piece TCG OP-08
body_html:
The One Piece TCG: OP-08 Two Legends Booster Pack is part of the exciting Two Legends expansion, bringing together iconic characters and storylines from the Drum Kingdom and Zou arcs. Each pack includes 6 cards, offering a chance to discover new Leader Cards, Commons, Uncommons, Rares, and even powerful Super Rare and Secret Rare cards. Players can look forward to cards featuring legends like Silvers Rayleigh and Whitebeard, allowing them to build powerful decks and relive epic battles from the One Piece universe.

With new strategies and abilities, this booster pack is perfect for both seasoned players and collectors looking to enhance their decks.

title: Weiss Schwarz: Nazarick - Tomb of the Undead Vol. 2 Booster Box
body_html:
The Weiss Schwarz: Nazarick - Tomb of the Undead Vol. 2 Booster Display brings the dark and thrilling world of Overlord to life. Featuring 16 booster packs, each containing 9 cards, this set showcases iconic scenes from Seasons 1 to 3 of the anime. Fans can collect cards of their favorite characters like Ainz Ooal Gown, Albedo, and more.

This booster display offers a chance to pull rare Sign Cards featuring autographs from the voice cast, along with exclusive PR Cards. Perfect for collectors and players alike, this set captures the essence of Nazarick’s dark fantasy world.

title: Weiss Schwarz: Ayakashi Triangle Booster Box
body_html:
Dive into the captivating world of Ayakashi Triangle with the Weiss Schwarz Booster Box! Each box contains 16 packs, with 9 cards per pack, giving you the chance to collect beautifully illustrated cards featuring your favorite characters like Matsuri Kazamaki and Suzu Kanade. With scenes from the anime brought to life on the cards, this set is a must-have for fans of the series.

Look out for exclusive Sign Cards and Parallel Cards, adding even more value to your collection. Whether you're a fan of the fantasy romance genre or a dedicated Weiss Schwarz player, this booster box is packed with excitement and power for your deck .

title: Weiss Schwarz: The Fruit of Grisaia Booster Box
body_html:
Immerse yourself in the dramatic and emotional story of The Fruit of Grisaia with the Weiss Schwarz Booster Box. This set features 16 booster packs, each containing 9 cards, for a total of 144 cards to add to your collection. The Fruit of Grisaia set brings you closer to the complex characters and intense plotlines of the anime, with beautifully illustrated cards that capture key moments from the series.

Every booster box includes 1 of 5 exclusive PR cards and offers a chance to pull rare sign cards featuring autographs from the voice actresses of the main characters. Build your deck and relive the captivating narrative with this collectible card game.

title: Weiss Schwarz: The Quintessential Quintuplets Movie Booster Box
body_html:
Step into the world of The Quintessential Quintuplets Movie with this Weiss Schwarz Booster Box! Featuring 16 packs, each containing 9 cards, this set brings the beloved quintuplets — Ichika, Nino, Miku, Yotsuba, and Itsuki — to life with beautifully illustrated cards. Every booster box contains 1 of 5 exclusive PR cards and offers a chance to pull rare Sign cards with autographs from the quintuplets’ voice actresses.

With over 100 different card types, including stunning Parallel cards, this set is perfect for fans of the series and collectors alike. Build your collection, power up your deck, and relive memorable scenes from the movie in this collectible trading card game​.

title: Topps Match Attax Extra 2024 - Full Box (36 Packets, 432 Cards)
body_html: The Topps Match Attax Extra 2024 Full Box is packed with 36 packets, each containing 12 cards, for a total of 432 collectible cards. This exciting set offers fans and collectors the chance to build their ultimate collection with 3 special insert cards in every pack, featuring foil cards, parallel cards, and the chance to find Black Edge, Chrome X, and Energy Wavefront cards. Each box also includes 2 Extreme Limited Edition cards, giving you the opportunity to collect some of the rarest and most exciting cards in the game.

title: 2024 Panini Boston Celtics NBA Champions Team Set Box
body_html:
Celebrate the Boston Celtics' record-breaking 18th NBA Championship with the 2024 Panini Boston Celtics NBA Champions Team Set Box. This commemorative box set includes 30 premium cards, featuring all key players from the championship-winning squad, including Jayson Tatum, Jaylen Brown, Al Horford, and Marcus Smart. The set highlights the Celtics' victory over the Dallas Mavericks in the NBA Finals and includes exclusive cards showcasing pivotal moments from the championship series.

Look for special cards capturing key highlights, team celebrations, and a tribute card honoring the NBA Finals MVP Jaylen Brown. Perfect for collectors and Celtics fans, this set immortalizes one of the greatest achievements in the franchise's storied history .

title: Surging Sparks Booster Blister SV08 Pokémon TCG
body_html:
The Pokémon TCG: Scarlet & Violet—Surging Sparks Booster Blister (SV08) offers an exciting way to jump into the action of this electrifying set. Each blister contains one booster pack featuring 10 cards and 1 Basic Energy, giving players the chance to collect new cards like the powerful Stellar Tera Pokémon ex, such as Pikachu ex, and Dragon-type Pokémon like Alolan Exeggutor ex and Archaludon ex.

Whether you're a competitive player or a collector, this booster blister is a perfect way to expand your deck or add rare cards to your collection. Experience the thrill of the Surging Sparks expansion and enhance your gameplay with new ACE SPEC cards, Trainer cards, and more​.

title: Surging Sparks Elite Trainer Box SV08 Pokémon TCG
body_html:
The Pokémon TCG: Scarlet & Violet—Surging Sparks Elite Trainer Box (SV08) is the perfect bundle for both collectors and competitive players. This box comes with 9 booster packs from the Surging Sparks expansion, each containing 10 cards and 1 Basic Energy, offering a chance to discover powerful new cards. This set introduces Stellar Tera Pokémon ex, led by Pikachu ex, alongside dragon Pokémon like Alolan Exeggutor ex and Latias ex.

In addition to the booster packs, you'll receive:

  • 1 full-art foil promo card featuring Magneton
  • 65 card sleeves
  • 45 Pokémon TCG Energy cards
  • A player’s guide to the Surging Sparks expansion
  • 6 damage-counter dice, a competition-legal coin-flip die, and 2 plastic condition markers
  • A sturdy collector’s box with 4 dividers to organize everything

This Elite Trainer Box is a great way to jumpstart your collection or improve your deck with powerful new cards from this exciting set.

title: Surging Sparks Booster Box Pokémon TCG SV08
body_html:
The Pokémon TCG: Scarlet & Violet—Surging Sparks Booster Box features 36 booster packs, each containing 10 cards and 1 Basic Energy. This electrifying set brings together over 250 cards, including powerful Stellar Tera Pokémon ex, new ACE SPEC cards, and a lineup of Dragon-type Pokémon led by Alolan Exeggutor ex, Archaludon ex, and Latias ex. Players will also find new Trainer cards and unique illustrations to enhance their decks.

The Surging Sparks expansion introduces several electrifying Lightning-type Pokémon, with Pikachu ex lighting up the battlefields with its Stellar Tera form, adding exciting new strategies for players. This set is perfect for collectors and competitive players alike, offering both thrilling gameplay and visually stunning cards.

title: One Piece TCG OP-08 Two Legends Double Pack Set Volume 5
body_html: The One Piece TCG OP-08 Two Legends Double Pack Set Volume 5 is a must-have for fans and collectors of the One Piece trading card game. This set includes two booster packs from the Two Legends series, each featuring cards from the iconic arcs of Drum Kingdom and Zou. Players will find new leader cards such as Tony Tony Chopper and Marco, and can expect to collect various rare, super rare, and alternate art cards. Additionally, the Double Pack Set comes with a special DON!! card—a collector’s item with exclusive designs—making it a perfect addition to any deck or collection.

title: Two Legends OP 08 Booster Box One Piece Card Game
body_html: The One Piece Card Game returns with its OP-08 "Two Legends" Booster Box, featuring exciting new characters from the Drum Kingdom and Zou Arcs. This set includes 24 booster packs, each with 6 cards, and introduces 6 new leaders like Tony Tony Chopper and Marco, alongside the infamous Edward Newgate. Build powerful decks with this collection that features 126 card types, including rare, super rare, and secret rare cards. Whether you're a collector or a competitive player, this set allows you to recreate epic battles with characters from the Whitebeard Pirates, Beast Pirates, and Big Mom Pirates!

title: Trick or Trade BOOster Bundle 2024 - 35 Mini Packs Pokémon TCG
body_html: Get ready for spooky fun with the 2024 Pokémon Trick or Trade BOOster Bundle! This limited-edition set comes with 35 mini packs, each containing 3 unique and colorful Pokémon cards. Ideal for Halloween trick-or-treaters, this bundle offers a fun alternative to candy while introducing kids to the world of Pokémon trading cards. It’s perfect for Pokémon fans and collectors alike, offering a thrilling surprise in every pack. Available while stocks last—make your Halloween even more special!

title: One Piece Starter Deck 3D2Y ST-14 English - Build Your Ultimate Straw Hat Crew Deck
body_html:
Set sail with the Straw Hat Crew in the One Piece Starter Deck 3D2Y ST-14 (English version). This deck is centered around a brand-new Black Leader card featuring Monkey D. Luffy and includes a collection of characters that appeared during the two years of training following the Summit War. Perfect for both new players and seasoned collectors, this starter deck provides everything you need to dive into the One Piece Card Game.

This 51-card deck is designed to unleash powerful synergies and strategies with high-cost allies, offering dynamic gameplay. With this deck, you can control the battlefield and steer the course of your games in exciting new directions. The set also includes 10 DON!! cards and a play sheet to help you master the game right out of the box.

title: Stellar Crown  Booster Blister Pokémon TCG: SV07
body_html: Explore the depths of the Terastal phenomenon with the Pokémon TCG: SV07 'Stellar Crown' Booster Blister. Each blister pack offers a thrilling opportunity to expand your collection with three booster packs from the Scarlet & Violet—Stellar Crown expansion. Uncover powerful new Pokémon, including Terapagos ex, Cinderace ex, and Lapras ex, all showcasing their unique Stellar Tera forms. This set also includes a promotional card and a collectible coin, perfect for both collectors and competitive players. With over 170 cards to discover, including rare ACE SPEC cards and special illustrations, the adventure awaits!

title: Pokémon TCG: SV07 'Stellar Crown' Three Pack Blister
body_html: Dive into the Terastal phenomenon with the Pokémon TCG: SV07 'Stellar Crown' Three Pack Blister. Each blister pack includes three booster packs from the Scarlet & Violet—Stellar Crown expansion, a promotional card featuring either Tinkaton or Latias, and a collectible coin. Uncover the potential of over 170 cards, including new Pokémon ex and ACE SPEC cards, as well as more than 20 Trainer cards and 30 special illustration cards. Perfect for collectors and players looking to expand their deck with some of the most exciting additions in the Pokémon TCG universe.

title: Stellar Crown Elite Trainer Box SV07 Pokémon TCG
body_html: Unleash the power of the Terastal phenomenon with the Pokémon TCG: Scarlet & Violet—Stellar Crown Elite Trainer Box. This comprehensive set includes 9 booster packs, each containing 10 cards and 1 Basic Energy, a full-art foil promo card featuring Noctowl, and 65 card sleeves showcasing Stellar Form Terapagos. The box also provides essential game accessories such as 45 Energy cards, 6 damage-counter dice, a competition-legal coin-flip die, 2 plastic condition markers, and a player's guide to the Scarlet & Violet—Stellar Crown expansion. All items are neatly packed in a collector’s box with 4 dividers, ensuring your collection stays organized and secure.

title: Stellar Crown Booster Box SV07 Pokémon TCG
body_html: Dive into the world of Pokémon with the SV07 'Stellar Crown' Booster Box! This sealed booster box is part of the Scarlet & Violet series and contains 36 booster packs, each with 10 cards and 1 Basic Energy. With over 170 unique cards to collect, including 10 Pokémon ex and 4 Stellar Tera Pokémon ex, this set is a must-have for any Pokémon TCG enthusiast. Additionally, you'll find more than 20 Trainer cards, special illustrations, and rare ACE SPEC Trainer cards, making this booster box packed with excitement and surprises!

title: 2023-24 NBA Prizm Basketball 24-Pack Retail Box
body_html: The 2023-24 NBA Prizm Basketball 24-Pack Retail Box by Panini is the ultimate addition to any sports trading card collection. This factory-sealed box contains 24 packs, each with a standard size trading card featuring top NBA players from the 2023-24 season. Look out for key rookies, including Victor Wembanyama, and exclusive Prizm parallels that make this set a collector’s dream. Manufactured in the USA, this box offers a unique opportunity to discover rare and valuable cards, including potential autographs and special inserts.

title: Bloomburrow Commander Deck Set of 4 Magic: The Gathering
body_html: Embark on a magical journey with the Magic: The Gathering Bloomburrow Commander Deck Set. This set includes four unique, ready-to-play 100-card decks, each featuring a distinct strategy and a host of charming critters. Whether you're fighting alongside mice, frogs, bats, or birds, these decks offer a rich gameplay experience with powerful rares, mythics, and exclusive foil treatments. Perfect for multiplayer battles and collectors alike, this set brings the enchanting world of Bloomburrow to life.

title: Bloomburrow Play Booster Box - 36 Packs Magic: The Gathering
body_html: Unleash the adventure with the Magic: The Gathering Bloomburrow Play Booster Box. This box contains 36 packs, each with 14 cards plus a Token/Ad card or Art card. Perfect for Limited play and collecting, enjoy the thrill of discovering rare and mythic cards, stunning foils, and exclusive art pieces. Battle beside critters like mice, frogs, and birds to restore peace in the Valley, and experience the magic of Bloomburrow.

title: Bloomburrow Collector Booster Box - 12 Packs Magic: The Gathering
body_html: Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Magic: The Gathering with the Bloomburrow Collector Booster Box. Featuring 12 packs filled with 15 cards each, this box is a treasure trove for collectors. Discover rare and mythic cards, stunning full-art lands, and exclusive foil treatments. Join the adventure with mice, frogs, bats, birds, and other critters to restore peace in the Valley and showcase your collection with pride.

title: Bloomburrow Bundle Magic: The Gathering
body_html: Dive into the enchanting world of Magic: The Gathering with the Bloomburrow Bundle. This bundle features 9 Play Boosters combining the best of Draft and Set Boosters, 30 Land cards with beautiful full-art designs, and exclusive accessories including a special die and sturdy storage box. Perfect for collectors and players alike, embark on an adventure with your favorite critters and prove that bravery comes in all sizes!

title: 500 Years in the Future  Booster Pack One Piece TCG OP07
body_html: Delve into the latest adventure of the One Piece Trading Card Game with the "500 Years in the Future" (OP07) Booster Pack. This 7th booster pack set features characters from the Egghead Arc of the anime, along with enhancements to popular themes such as the Revolutionary Army, Supernova, and the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Each booster pack contains 12 cards, including a mix of Leaders, Commons, Uncommons, Rares, Super Rares, Secret Rares, Special Cards, and Treasure Rares.

title: 500 Years in the Future Booster Box One Piece TCG  OP07
body_html: Immerse yourself in the latest expansion of the One Piece Trading Card Game with the "500 Years in the Future" (OP07) Booster Box. This 7th booster pack set features characters from the Egghead Arc of the TV anime, along with enhancements to popular themes like the Revolutionary Army, Supernova, and Seven Warlords of the Sea. Each box contains 24 packs, with each pack containing cards from a pool of 126+1 card types including Leaders, Commons, Uncommons, Rares, Super Rares, Secret Rares, Special Cards, and Treasure Rares. Key cards include new leader cards and other rare collectibles.

title: Skybox 1990-91 Basketball Cards Series 2 Box
body_html:
Step back into the golden era of basketball with the Skybox 1990-91 Basketball Cards Series 2 Box. This box set is part of Skybox's debut into the basketball card market, featuring a comprehensive 423-card set divided into two series. Series 2 consists of 123 cards, which include a mix of players from both Series 1 and Series 2, creating a diverse and exciting collection.

Each box contains 36 packs, with 15 cards per pack, offering collectors a chance to find key rookie cards like Gary Payton and other NBA legends. The cards are known for their unique designs and high-quality prints, making them a treasured addition to any collection.

title: Upper Deck Skybox Metal Universe Champions Blaster Box 2021
body_html: Explore the thrilling world of the 2021 Upper Deck Skybox Metal Universe Champions Blaster Box. This collection includes 5 packs, each containing 7 cards, featuring a total of 35 cards. The set includes a 150-card base set with 50 high-series Metalized cards. Look for exclusive parallels such as Copper and Silver Dots, with regular cards in the Silver Dots parallel numbered to 299 and high-series Metalized cards numbered to 199. Additionally, you can discover Blaster Exclusive parallels like Skybox Premium Gold and Gold Auto cards. This set features a mix of retired legends, active superstars, and up-and-coming phenoms, offering a comprehensive collection for sports card enthusiasts.

title: Star Wars Unlimited: Shadows of the Galaxy Booster Display English
body_html: Dive into the Star Wars universe with the Star Wars Unlimited: Shadows of the Galaxy Booster Display. This set, part of the second expansion of the Star Wars Unlimited trading card game, brings new excitement with a focus on the smugglers, scoundrels, and bounty hunters of the Outer Rim. Each booster display contains 24 packs, with each pack featuring 16 cards including 9 common cards, 3 uncommon cards, 1 rare or legendary card, 1 leader, 1 base/token, and 1 foil card. Additionally, there's a chance to discover rare "Hyperspace" and "Showcase" variants of existing cards. This set highlights characters and storylines from The Mandalorian, Solo: A Star Wars Story, and The Book of Boba Fett, making it a must-have for collectors and players alike.

title: Dragon Ball Super Card Game - Legend of the Dragon Balls Booster Box B25
body_html:
Translator

 

Unleash your inner Saiyan with the Dragon Ball Super Card Game's Legend of the Dragon Balls Booster Box (B25). This set celebrates the 7th anniversary of the Dragon Ball Super Card Game with an exciting array of cards. Each booster box contains 24 packs, with each pack containing 12 cards, including a chance to collect special anniversary limited edition cards. The set features 170+ cards, including 60 commons, 30 uncommons, 29 rares, 18 super rares, 14 special rares, 9 special rare leaders, 7 campaign rares, 4 secret rares, and 2 god rares. Perfect for collectors and players alike, this booster box offers thrilling gameplay and iconic characters from the beloved Dragon Ball series.

title: Saikyo Jump June 2024 Issue
body_html:
Unlock the power of the latest issue of Saikyo Jump, the ultimate monthly manga magazine from Shueisha. The June 2024 issue is packed with exciting content, including:

  • Exclusive Promotional Cards: Get your hands on three powerful cards for Yu-Gi-Oh! Rush Duel, Super Dragon Ball Heroes, and Union Arena. This month's featured Yu-Gi-Oh! card is the legendary "Copycat," adding unique and powerful effects to your deck.
  • Jujutsu Kaisen Stickers: A magical set of stickers from the popular series, perfect for decorating your favorite items or adding to your collection.
  • Gojo Pen Holder: Keep track of your pens with this exclusive Gojo Pen Holder, inspired by the iconic character from Jujutsu Kaisen.

This issue also includes in-depth articles, manga chapters, and special features from some of the greatest series ever. Whether you're a collector or a fan of manga, Saikyo Jump keeps you connected to your favorite universes.

Key Features:

  • Three exclusive promotional cards for Yu-Gi-Oh! Rush Duel, Super Dragon Ball Heroes, and Union Arena
  • Jujutsu Kaisen stickers
  • Exclusive Gojo Pen Holder
  • In-depth articles and manga chapters from top series

title: V Jump June 2024 Issue
body_html:
Dive into the latest issue of V Jump, the premier Japanese cross-platform gaming magazine. The June 2024 issue brings you exclusive content and exciting features, including:

  • Galaxy War Drake Card for Yu-Gi-Oh OCG: Unlock the power of this mecha-dragon with the included promotional card.
  • Yusuke Urameshi Card for Union Arena: Chase the demons with this powerful card.

This issue is packed with in-depth articles, previews, and exclusive insights into the gaming world, making it a must-have for enthusiasts and collectors alike. Each issue offers a blend of gaming news, manga chapters, and special features that keep you connected to your favorite franchises.

Key Features:

  • Exclusive Galaxy War Drake promotional card for Yu-Gi-Oh OCG
  • Yusuke Urameshi card for Union Arena
  • Detailed gaming news and previews
  • Manga chapters and special features

title: Topps Euro 2024 Sticker Box - Swiss Edition (100 Packs, 6 Stickers per Pack)
body_html:
Kick off your Euro 2024 collection with the Topps Euro 2024 Sticker Box, Swiss Edition. This box contains 100 packs, each with 6 stickers, totaling 600 stickers. This inaugural Euro sticker collection from Topps brings the excitement of the tournament to life in an expansive 88-page album, complemented by a vast array of 728 stickers.

The collection includes various exciting categories such as Top XI, Captains, and Players to Watch, highlighting the most outstanding players and moments. It also features Nation Logos, Artists, and Legendary Euro Masters, celebrating the rich history and artistry of the game. Elevate your collection with the highly sought-after Gold Star Player stickers and the coveted Gold Signature Series stickers, alongside a selection of stunning parallels.

In addition to these special categories, the collection features ultra-rare 1/1 (one-of-one) stickers, making them some of the most desirable items for collectors. These unique stickers add significant value and excitement to the collection, ensuring that each pack opening is a thrilling experience.

Key Features:

  • Contains 100 packs, each with 6 stickers (600 stickers total)
  • Includes categories like Top XI, Captains, Players to Watch, Nation Logos, Artists, and Legendary Euro Masters
  • Features Gold Star Player stickers and Gold Signature Series stickers
  • Includes stunning parallels for enhanced collection value
  • Ultra-rare 1/1 stickers possible in the box !
  • Official Swiss edition, ensuring authenticity and exclusivity

Start your Euro 2024 journey and capture the essence of the tournament with this comprehensive sticker collection.

title: Pokémon TCG: Ruler of the Black Flame Booster Box Japanese
body_html:
Dive into the exciting world of Pokémon with the Japanese-exclusive Pokémon TCG: Ruler of the Black Flame Booster Box (SV3). This set features the debut of Dark-type Charizard ex, along with a host of other powerful Pokémon like Tyranitar ex, Eiscue ex, and Vespiquen ex. Each booster box contains 30 packs, with 5 cards per pack, providing ample opportunities to complete your collection and hunt for rare cards.

The set introduces the new Terastal mechanic, adding strategic depth to your gameplay. With a total of 141 cards, including secret rares, this set is a must-have for collectors and players alike. The booster box is sealed and shrink-wrapped, ensuring the contents are protected and authentic.

Key Features:

  • Contains 30 booster packs, each with 5 random cards
  • Features Dark-type Charizard ex and other powerful Pokémon
  • Introduces the new Terastal mechanic
  • Total of 141 cards including secret rares
  • All cards and packaging are in Japanese

Experience the thrill of opening packs and discovering new additions to your deck with the Ruler of the Black Flame Booster Box.

title: Ultra PRO 1/4" Screwdown Recessed Holder
body_html:
The Ultra PRO 1/4" Screwdown Recessed Holder is designed to provide premium protection and display for your standard-sized trading cards (2-1/2" x 3-1/2"). This holder features a 1/4" thick ultra-clear two-piece design with a recessed area to securely hold your card in place. It includes four screws, one at each corner, to ensure your card is tightly enclosed. Made with acid-free, non-PVC materials, this holder offers exceptional protection while showcasing your card's true colors.

Key Features:

  • Fits standard-sized trading cards (2-1/2" x 3-1/2")
  • 1/4" thick ultra-clear, two-piece design
  • Four-screw closure for secure storage
  • Recessed area to keep cards in place
  • Made with acid-free, non-PVC materials

Ideal for collectors who want to protect and display their valuable cards with style and security.

title: Ultra PRO UV Magnetic ONE-TOUCH Holder for Booster Packs
body_html:
The Ultra PRO UV Magnetic ONE-TOUCH Holder is specifically designed to protect and display your valuable booster packs. title: Assassin's Creed Collector Booster Box Magic: The Gathering
body_html:
Elevate your collection to legendary status with the Magic: The Gathering Assassin's Creed Collector Booster Box. Each box contains 12 collector boosters, each packed with 10 cards that blend the intricate worlds of Assassin's Creed and Magic: The Gathering:

  • Premium Content: Open twelve 10-card collector boosters featuring a mix of brilliant foil cards, rare finds, and Assassin's Creed themed cards with alternative artwork and frames.
  • Step into History: Immerse yourself in the Assassin's Creed universe within Magic: The Gathering. Discover ancient locales, wield deadly weapons, and ensure your foes become part of history.
  • Exclusive Card Treatments: Each booster is loaded with 2 super-premium cards, and chances to find a textured premium or a unique double rainbow serial premium card, elevating the unboxing experience.
  • Borderless and Extended-Art Cards: Enhance your decks with 1 to 2 extended-art cards and 1 to 3 borderless alternative-art cards per pack, offering a fresh perspective on the Assassin's Creed story.
  • Strategic Play Meets Epic Storytelling: With strategic depth, rich lore, and stunning card art, this collector booster box is perfect for players and collectors alike, welcoming all to the gathering.

title: Assassin's Creed Infinite Draft Booster Box Magic: The Gathering
body_html:
Unlock the mysteries of history with the Magic: The Gathering Assassin's Creed Infinite Draft Booster Box. Each box is a gateway to a unique fusion of the Assassin's Creed world with the strategic depth of Magic: The Gathering, offering:

  • 24 Infinite Boosters: Dive into 24 seven-card boosters filled with characters, iconic items, and memorable moments from the Assassin's Creed franchise. Each pack promises an adventure, pulling you deeper into the game's lore.
  • Exclusive Content in Every Pack: Discover 1 to 4 rare or higher rarity cards, including at least one traditional foil premium card and one full-art borderless card in every booster, making each pack an exciting treasure hunt.
  • Legendary and Thematically Rich: The beloved video game series comes to life through stunning new artwork and thematic game mechanics, delighting fans of both Assassin's Creed and Magic: The Gathering.
  • A Collector's Dream: With premium foil and borderless cards in every pack, and the chance for multiple rares, these boosters are designed to enrich your collection with the beauty and strategy of the game.
  • Engage in Epic Strategy: Magic: The Gathering's hallmark combination of art, story, and strategic gameplay is on full display, inviting you to enjoy friendly matches, collect exceptional cards, or compete with the best.

title: Assassin's Creed Starter Kit Magic: The Gathering
body_html:
Embark on your journey through the storied universe of Assassin's Creed merged with the strategic gameplay of Magic: The Gathering with this specially designed Starter Kit. Perfect for newcomers or those looking to introduce friends to MTG, this kit contains everything needed for two players to start their adventure:

  • Two 60-Card Ready-to-Play Decks: Choose your path with either the blue-black deck led by Ezio, the master assassin, or the white-red deck with Eivor, the fierce Viking warrior. Each deck is themed to immerse you in the Assassin's Creed storyline while teaching the fundamentals of Magic play.
  • Learn Together: With an included guide explaining the rules of the game, this kit makes learning Magic a fun and engaging experience. It's ideal for a friendly game night or as the first step into the world of competitive play.
  • Start Your Collection: Each deck includes two mythical rare cards (one in traditional premium foil) and eight rare cards, offering a strong foundation for building your collection.
  • A Blend of Art, Story, and Strategy: Magic: The Gathering is renowned for its deep strategic gameplay, rich lore, and beautiful card art, all of which are on full display in this Assassin's Creed themed kit.

Contents:

  • 2 Ready-to-Play 60-Card Decks (including lands)
  • 2 Mythical Rare Cards (1 premium foil) and 16 Rare Cards
  • 1 Learning Guide and 2 Deck Boxes
  • 2 Double-Sided Reference Cards

Step into the shadows and prepare for your first Magic battles with the Assassin's Creed Starter Kit. Whether you're aiming to win or just enjoy the lore, this kit welcomes you to the Magic community.

title: Assassin's Creed Infinite Bundle Magic the Gathering
body_html:
Step into the shadows and rewrite history with the Magic: The Gathering Assassin's Creed Infinite Bundle. This limited edition set is a perfect blend of the iconic Assassin's Creed universe and the strategic gameplay of Magic: The Gathering. The bundle includes:

  • 9 Assassin's Creed Infinite Boosters: Each 7-card booster brings to life characters, items, and memorable moments from the Assassin's Creed series.
  • Exclusive Alternate-Art Promo Card: Enhance your collection with a special promo card featuring unique art and a traditional foil finish.
  • Comprehensive Accessories: The set comes with 40 basic land cards (20 foil, 20 non-foil), a large Spindown life counter, a storage box, and reference cards to keep your gameplay smooth and organized.
  • Immerse in Strategy and Lore: With cards that explore ancient locales and arm you with deadly weapons, your targets will soon become a part of history.

Perfect for fans looking to dive into the Assassin's Creed theme or for players seeking to add some strategic depth and stunning art to their collection, this bundle welcomes all to an assembly where illustrations, stories, and strategy combine to create unforgettable Magic moments.

title: Awakened Pulse Booster Box Dragon Ball Super Fusion World -  FB01 Japanese Edition
body_html:
Celebrate the monumental 40th anniversary of the Dragon Ball saga with the BANDAI Dragon Ball Super Card Game Fusion World - Awakening Heartbeat (FB01) Japanese Edition. This groundbreaking set, released on February 23, 2024, ushers in a new era of Dragon Ball TCG, introducing the Fusion World series alongside the established Masters series, catering to both new and veteran players.

The Awakened Pulse (FB01) is the inaugural set for Fusion World, designed to offer a simpler yet strategically rich gameplay experience, making it accessible to younger players and newcomers without sacrificing the depth that veterans appreciate. Inspired by the One Piece Card Game and incorporating elements from the original Dragon Ball Super: Masters game, Fusion World aims to attract a dedicated player base with its unique blend of simplicity and depth.

Each of the 24 Japanese Edition booster packs includes 12 cards featuring iconic characters and new leader cards, such as Son Goku and Vegeta, along with a digital code card for unlocking digital versions of the cards, bridging the physical and digital realms of card gaming. With 140 cards in total, including 8 Leaders, 52 Commons, 36 Uncommons, 30 Rares, 12 Super Rares, and 2 Secret Rares, plus 23 alternate art variants, this set promises unparalleled collectability and competitive play.

Dive into the Fusion World with this exclusive Japanese edition box set and experience the evolution of Dragon Ball Super Card Game.

title: Pokémon Scarlet & Violet: Raging Surf Booster (Japanese)
body_html:
Embark on an exhilarating Pokémon adventure with the "Scarlet & Violet: Raging Surf Booster Box (Japanese Version),".This highly anticipated subset of the Pokémon Trading Card Game's Scarlet & Violet era features over 62 unique cards, including a diverse array of legendary and mythical Pokémon, as well as the rare Gholdengo. The set continues the introduction of type-shifted Tera Pokémon ex and marks the return of Technical Machine cards, now classified as Pokémon Tool cards. Each booster pack contains five cards, promising a thrilling experience in collecting and gameplay. Designed for sealed format tournaments, this set is perfect for players who love the excitement of building decks with new and dynamic cards.

Key Set Features:

  • Over 62 cards featuring legendary, mythical, and rare Pokémon.
  • Introduction of type-shifted Tera Pokémon ex and the return of Technical Machine cards.
  • Each booster pack contains 5 cards tailored for exciting gameplay.
  • Ideal for sealed format tournaments and deck building.
  • Released in Japanese, offering an authentic Pokémon TCG experience.

title: Pokemon Scarlet & Violet: Raging Surf Booster Box JP - Dive into Legendary Battles
body_html:
Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of Pokémon with the "Scarlet & Violet: Raging Surf Booster Box JP." This Japanese TCG set offers a spectacular collection of cards, featuring legendary and mythical Pokémon like Garchomp, Groudon, Yvetal, Palkia, Jirachi, and Tapu Koko. Notably, it includes the 1000th Pokémon, Gholdengo, making it a significant addition to any collector's trove.

Each booster box contains 30 packs, with 7 cards in each, promising a variety of exciting finds. Look out for the reintroduction of Technical Machine (TM) cards, dating back to the 2009 Platinum series, and the more Type-shifted Tera ex Pokémon cards, adding a fresh twist to your battles. Waifu collectors will be thrilled with characters like Shauntal, Rika, and the Full Art SR version of Parasol Lady, potentially the set's most valuable cards. Additionally, ARs featuring Mantyke, Plusle, and Minun with their unique linking artwork add a creative dimension to the collection.

Key Features:

  • 30 booster packs per box, each containing 7 Japanese TCG cards.
  • Features legendary and mythical Pokémon, including the milestone Pokémon #1000, Gholdengo.
  • Introduces more Type-shifted Tera ex Pokémon cards and the return of Technical Machine cards.
  • Includes sought-after female characters and potentially valuable Full Art SR versions.
  • ARs with unique linking artworks for an enhanced collecting experience.

title: Magic The Gathering - Fallout - Collector Booster Box English
body_html:
·Language: English

THE VAULTS ARE OPEN—Collect Magic cards featuring fan-favorite characters, thematic game mechanics, and art that explores the post-nuclear world of the Fallout series

· SCAVANGE THE WASTELAND'S MOST S.P.E.C.I.A.L. CARDS—Get Collector Boosters full of Rare cards, special Fallout alt-art, alt-frame cards, and a total of 6–7 Extended-Art cards

· HOLD ONTO ANYTHING SHINY—Every pack contains 12 cards with a foil treatment that will gleam in the harsh light of the nuclear wastes, including 3–10 special Surge Foil cards with a rippling shine—it's tomorrow's technology today!

· PLAY A GAME THAT FUSES ART, STORIES & STRATEGY—Magic: The Gathering is a collectible card game that weaves deep strategy with art and mechanics that explore the themes of a particular world and story—whether you want to play a casual game with friends, collect cool cards, or get competitive, Magic welcomes you to The Gathering

· CONTENTS—12 Magic: The Gathering - Fallout Collector Boosters, with 15 MTG cards in each pack

 

 

The vault is open! These boosters are so overstuffed with perks for Fallout fans, they'll test the limits of your carrying capacity. Expect to encounter Rares and/or Mythics, Traditional Foils, Extended-Art cards, and special Fallout-themed card treatments. This Magic: The Gathering—Fallout Collector Booster Box contains 12 Fallout Collector Boosters. Each booster contains 15 Magic: The Gathering cards and 1 Traditional Foil double-sided token, with a combination of 7–14 cards of rarity Rare or higher and up to 7 Uncommon, up to 5 Common, and 1 Land cards. Every pack contains a total of 12 cards with a shining foil treatment, including 3–10 Surge Foils and 2–9 Traditional Foils.

From Dogmeat leading the Scrappy Survivors to Dr. Madison Li commanding the Science! deck, immerse yourself in Fallout's dystopian world while enjoying the strategic depth of Magic: The Gathering.

title: Paradox Rift Booster Box English Pokémon
body_html:
Step into a realm where time bends and the extraordinary becomes the norm with the English edition of the Pokémon TCG: Scarlet & Violet—Paradox Rift Booster Box. Released on November 3, 2023, this set is the cornerstone of the fourth expansion from the Scarlet & Violet Series, offering a treasure trove of 182+ innovative cards that blend history with futuristic vision.

The Paradox Rift expansion introduces two groundbreaking variants of cards: Ancient and Future, which are featured both as Pokémon and Trainer cards. Ancient cards are marked by a unique layered strata background, embodying attacks of raw power and resilience. Future cards boast a digital pixelated backdrop, highlighting abilities and attacks that pave the way for strategic gameplay. These distinctive cards are designed to assist one another, creating an immersive battle experience that honors the lore while propelling the game forward​.

Each Booster Box is a gateway to diversity, including 13 Pokémon ex, seven Tera Pokémon ex, and a plethora of ultra-rare finds, such as 34 illustration rare Pokémon, 15 special illustration rare Pokémon and Supporter cards, as well as seven hyper-rare gold etched cards. Not to mention, the absence of certain Pokémon types like Lightning in Ancient Roar and Darkness in Future Flash, adds a layer of strategic deck building​​.

Priced competitively, the Booster Box contains 36 packs, providing a superior value per pack than purchasing individual boosters. This set is your ticket to an array of valuable pulls, including new Ancient and Future Pokémon, over 20 Trainer cards, and 15 new Pokémon ex. The allure of the Paradox Rift lies in its ability to offer a wide range of cards that can potentially transform gameplay and collecting​.

Embrace the excitement of the unknown with the Paradox Rift Booster Box. Whether you're a seasoned trainer or new to the arena, this collection promises a thrilling journey through the paradoxes of Area Zero, where timelines converge and legendary Pokémon await. With its global availability in multiple languages, Paradox Rift is not just a collection but an international phenomenon in the world of Pokémon TCG.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legend of Blue Eyes White Dragon 25th Anniversary Display Booster Box - The Genesis of Yu-Gi-Oh! Now in a Commemorative Edition
body_html:
Embark on a nostalgic journey back to the very roots of the Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game with the exquisite Legend of Blue Eyes White Dragon 25th Anniversary Display Booster Box. This cherished collection marks the monumental 25th anniversary of the Yu-Gi-Oh! saga, reprising the first ever booster set that introduced the world to iconic cards and legendary duels.

Key Highlights:

  • The Box Configuration: Dive into 24 packs per box, each housing 9 enthralling cards, promising a treasure trove of classic and powerful cards that shaped the dueling landscape​1​​2​.
  • The Genesis Set: Legend of Blue Eyes White Dragon was the very first booster set ever released in the Yu-Gi-Oh! TCG universe, marking the inception of an era​1​​3​​4​.
  • Coveted Cards: Relive the emergence of legendary cards like Exodia the Forbidden One, alongside indispensable spell cards like Pot of Greed and Raigeki, marking their remarkable debut in this set​3​​2​.
  • Secret Rares: This special printing honors the legacy by featuring both Secret Rares from the original set, offering a rare glimpse into the rich history of Yu-Gi-Oh!​2​.
  • A Walk Down Memory Lane: For years, these coveted packs were only available as part of the Legendary Collection, but now they return as standalone booster packs, just in time to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the card game​2​.
  • Expanded Universe: The 25th Anniversary packs bring not only Legend of Blue Eyes White Dragon but also other seminal sets like Invasion of Chaos, Pharaoh's Servant, Spell Ruler, and Metal Raiders back to store shelves, relishing the nostalgia and the origins of the game​5​.

Unveil the legends, seize the rare cards, and become part of the Yu-Gi-Oh! legacy with this 25th Anniversary Display Booster Box. This collector's item is not just a treasure trove of powerful cards, but a homage to the rich history and the humble beginnings of the Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game. Whether you're a seasoned duelist or a nostalgic fan, this commemorative edition is a tribute to the timeless duels and the enduring spirit of the Yu-Gi-Oh! community.

title: Awakening of the New Era Booster Japanese One Piece TCG OP05
body_html:
Product Overview: Embark on an exhilarating journey with the "Awakening of the New Era" booster pack for the One Piece Trading Card Game. This highly anticipated OP05 series celebrates the 1st Anniversary of the One Piece Card Game with an array of remarkable cards.

Key Features:

  • Original Illustration by Eiichiro Oda: For the first time, a card featuring an original illustration by the legendary Eiichiro Oda is included, making it a prized possession for One Piece fans.
  • Debut of Iconic Characters: Experience the debut of characters from the Sky Island Saga and the Revolutionary Army, including the powerful God Enel and the formidable Sabo.
  • Introduction of GEAR5 Luffy: The strongest stage, "GEAR5 Luffy", makes its debut, alongside Kaido from the Land of Wano arc, adding an exciting dimension to your battles.
  • Manga Illustration Leader Cards: Special parallel versions of manga illustration leader cards from "ROMANCE DAWN" and "PARAMOUNT WAR" are featured, enriching your collection.
  • Exclusive SP and Super Parallel Cards: This series includes SP cards and, for the first time, 3 types of Super Parallel cards, offering a luxurious and unique addition to your deck.

Contents and Rarities:

  • Total of 126+1 card types
  • Includes Leader Cards, Commons, Uncommons, Rares, Super Rares, Secret Rares, Special Cards, a DON!! Card, and a 1st Anniversary Special Card
  • Each pack consists of cards with varied rarities, offering a thrilling unboxing experience.

Product Benefits:

  • Enhance your One Piece TCG collection with rare and exclusive cards.
  • Experience the thrill of discovering new characters and powerful abilities.
  • Enjoy the superior quality and intricate designs that embody the spirit of One Piece.

title: Kingdoms of Intrigue Booster Box Japanese OP04
body_html:
Dive into the enthralling tales of Alabasta and Dressrosa with the "Kingdoms of Intrigue Booster Box Japanese OP04", an exquisite collection designed to elevate your One Piece card game experience. Manufactured by Bandai, this booster box invites you to explore the new horizons of gameplay enriched with multicolored cards featuring your favorite leaders in fresh combinations. Every box unveils 24 packs, each containing 6 intricately designed cards, summing up to a whopping 124+1 unique types of cards waiting to be added to your collection. The set intricately categorizes the cards into various rarities including 45 Common, 26 Rare, 10 Super Rare, 2 Secret Rare, 5 Special cards, and a unique Don!! card. As a cherry on top, find 25 parallel illustration cards that are randomly enclosed to surprise you with every pack you unfold. The booster box dimensions of 40 x 30 x 15 cm make it a compact yet substantial addition to your collection,

Whether you are a seasoned collector or a new entrant in the One Piece card game realm, the "Kingdoms of Intrigue Booster Box Japanese OP04" is a treasure trove waiting to be explored. Grab yours and step into a world of strategic battles and captivating storylines reflecting the essence of Alabasta and Dressrosa arcs from the beloved One Piece universe.

title: Pillars of Strength Booster Box Japanese One Piece TCG OP03
body_html:

Immerse yourself in the enthralling adventures of the high seas with the "One Piece Pillars of Strength Booster Box OP03 Japanese." This captivating collection, engineered by Bandai, promises an exhilarating voyage into the heart of the ONE PIECE CARD GAME. Here's what awaits you in this treasure chest of strategy and narrative:

  • 127 Unique Card Types: Dive into a vast sea of 127 distinct cards, each bursting with vivid illustrations and strategic potential. Explore different rarities including 8 Leader Cards, 45 Commons, 32 Uncommons, 26 Rares, 10 Super Rares, 2 Secret Rares, and 4 Special Cards​1​​2​.
  • Mighty Enemies Theme: Embark on a strategic voyage with the mighty enemies that Luffy and his crew have confronted in their past. The booster is themed around the strong adversaries from the East Blue, Water Seven, and Whole Cake Island sagas, bringing a taste of intense battles and historic confrontations into the gameplay​3​​2​.
  • New "Yellow" Cards: Discover the new "Yellow" cards that not only introduce a fresh color to the mix but also bring in new multicolor leader cards with unique color combinations, expanding the strategic horizon of the game​2​.

title: Blue Sky Stream Booster Pack - Japanese Pokémon TCG | Evolving Skies Series
body_html:
Experience the soaring adventure of the Pokémon TCG with the Japanese Blue Sky Stream Booster Pack, part of the epic Evolving Skies expansion. Released on July 9, 2021, as a key part of the seventh Sword & Shield Series expansion, this set brings a thrilling focus on the formidable Alloy Pokémon Duraludon and the legendary Sky High Pokémon Rayquaza. Each pack showcases these majestic Dragon-type Pokémon, featuring both Pokémon V and Pokémon VMAX versions, with Duraludon in its stunning Gigantamax form.

This set, which includes a total of 90 cards (67 Normal, 23 Secret), is renowned for its introduction of Duraludon VMAX and Rayquaza VMAX, making it a coveted addition for serious collectors and players seeking a competitive edge. In addition to these headliners, the set emphasizes the Eeveelutions, with several Pokémon V and VMAX versions, all beautifully illustrated in full art.

Each Blue Sky Stream booster pack contains five cards, offering a glimpse into the diverse world of Pokémon, now replete with Dragon-type Pokémon featuring unique aesthetics and attacks requiring two different types of energy. This set, part of the dual release with Skyscraping Perfection, forms a significant part of the Sword & Shield Era of the Japanese Pokémon card game, promising both excitement and rarity with every pack opened

title: Shiny Star V  Booster Box  Pokémon Japanese S4a
body_html:
Pokémon Shiny Star V (S4a) Booster Display

Language: Japanese

The ハイクラスパック シャイニースターV (High-Class Pack Shiny Star V) is a subset from the SWSH cycle. With a total of 330 cards, it's the largest expansion ever released in Japan. Even when considering international expansions, it holds this record.

Shiny Star V (Japanese: High Class Pack Shiny Star V) is a special expansion released during the Sword & Shield series of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. In Japan, it represents the fourth subset released during the Sword & Shield era. The expansion features Pokémon V and VMAX, as well as Shiny Pokémon.

High Class Pack Shiny Star V was released in Japan on November 20, 2020, continuing the trend established by previous High Class Packs, with a significant number of reprinted cards, with a particular focus on Pokémon V and Pokémon VMAX. Some of the Pokémon included in the subset feature artwork that was previously exclusive to English expansions and various products. The subset also includes a large number of shiny Pokémon, all of which are reprints of cards released during the Sword & Shield era, featuring a special embossed Holofoil treatment and being secret cards. All regular shiny Pokémon cards have unique artwork and come in the "S" rarity, while all shiny Pokémon V use their previous Full Art print artwork and come in the "SSR" rarity. With the exception of Amazing Rare Pokémon, Pokémon V, and Pokémon VMAX cards, all non-secret cards have no rarity symbol.

Shiny Star V contains 330 cards, including 140 secret cards, making it the largest Japanese set, surpassing the 250 cards found in the GX Ultra Shiny subset. Shiny Star V also features a parallel foil set with a Reverse Halo Holofoil variant for all non-holofoil cards in the main set. Each booster pack contains 10 cards instead of the usual five, with a guaranteed Pokémon V or Pokémon VMAX card.

Cycle: Sword & Shield

Display Contents:

  • A display includes 10 boosters.
  • Each booster contains 10 cards.
  • Among them, one card is guaranteed to be a "V" card or better.

Box Type: Booster Box Brand: Pokémon Language: Japanese

title: Tag Team GX Tag all Stars Booster box Pokémon Japanese SM12a
body_html:
Pokémon TAG TEAM GX Tag all Stars ( Sm12a) Booster box japanese

 

Product Information: Pokémon TAG TEAM GX: Tag All Stars (SM12a) Booster Display – JP

Language: Japanese

The ハイクラスパック "TAG TEAM GXタッグオールスターズ" High-Class Pack TAG TEAM GX Tag Team All Stars is a subset from the SM cycle.

A unique feature of the set is booster packs containing only Secret Rares, often referred to as "God-Packs." However, these are exceedingly rare.

Tag All Stars (Japanese: TAG TEAM GX: High Class Pack: TAG TEAM GX: All Stars Markers) is the name of the nineteenth and final Japanese subset released during the Sun & Moon era of Pokémon Trading Card Game. It serves as an expansion to the twelfth and last main expansion Alter Genesis under the collection symbol "SM12a." The set primarily consists of reprints of cards from the latter half of the Sun & Moon era, with a focus on the popular Tag Team Pokémon-GX cards.

As the final main release of the Sun & Moon era, the High Class Pack: TAG TEAM GX: Tag All Stars acts as a retrospective of the Tag Team expansion block, similar to The Best of XY for XY and XY BREAK eras. As such, it includes a large number of reprinted cards from that time, featuring key Tag Teams from the Tag Bolt, Double Blaze, and Miracle Twin expansions, as well as the Night Unison, Full Metal Wall, GG End, and Sky Legend subsets, among other popular Pokémon-GX cards. Some Pokémon featured in the subsets have artwork previously only available on cards outside of Japan.

Similar to the previous High Class Pack GX Ultra Shiny, Tag All Stars includes a significant number of secret cards - a total of 53, including Full Art and Rainbow Rare versions of Pokémon-GX that previously only received regular prints in standalone products, Full Art versions of previously released Trainer cards, and embossed Holofoil versions of basic Energy cards. The seven featured Tag Teams from previous expansions and subgroups also receive golden Ultra Rare versions for a total of 226 cards. Tag All Stars also features a foil set - every card without a rarity symbol includes a Mirror Holofoil variant. When combined with the standard set and 9 generic basic Energy cards, it forms a Master Set of 369 cards.

Each booster pack contains 11 cards instead of the usual 5, including 1 guaranteed Pokémon-GX card, 2 Holofoil cards, 1 Energy card, and 1 parallel foil card. Energy cards are always Mirror Holofoil, unless a pack includes a Super Rare version of one. Approximately 1 in 250 packs can contain 10 Super Rare cards in addition to the Energy card, colloquially known as "God-Packs" in other TCG circles, marking a first for the Pokémon TCG in Japan.

Cycle: Sun & Moon

Display Contents:

  • A display includes 10 boosters.
  • Each booster contains 10 cards.
  • Among them, one card is guaranteed to be a "GX" card or better.

Box Type: Booster Box Brand: Pokémon Language: Japanese Condition: New

title: Disney Lorcana - The First Chapter Booster Box 1st Print Pre-Errata English
body_html:
Discover the whimsical charm of Disney's inaugural foray into the Trading Card Game universe with the Disney Lorcana Booster Box from The First Chapter. As an Illumineer, you're endowed with the power to summon the essence of beloved Disney characters into duels filled with magic and strategy. Embrace the fantasy and let your imagination soar with each draw from these booster packs.

Our First Edition Booster Box is not only a gateway to the enchanting world of Lorcana but also a piece of history, with a limited run of cards featuring subtle yet intriguing erratas. These corrected cards, like "HeiHei, Boat Snack," which now includes the crucial word "another" to clear up gameplay, and "Work Together," which corrects the misattributed quote from "Pasha" to "Pacha," mark the continuous evolution and dedication to the integrity of the game​​.

The erratas, which are lists of corrections made post-release, showcase the dedication to detail and are a nod to the collectible nature of TCGs. The First Chapter's first print run saw a handful of such erratas, making these cards potentially more valuable for collectors seeking the original versions​​.

Each booster is a portal to adventure with two rare cards and a lustrous foil card. With six levels of rarity, the thrill of finding a Secret Rare card is just a pack away. Construct your decks and challenge opponents with:

  • 1 magnificent foil card of any rarity
  • 2 rare, super rare, or legendary cards, with a chance at enchanted alternative art cards
  • 3 uncommon cards
  • 6 common cards

This Booster Box contains 24 booster packs, each with 12 cards from The First Chapter, offering a splendid opportunity to build a formidable collection or discover those unique first-print errata'd cards that stand out in the realm of Disney Lorcana.
